<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[@log-right/base](./base.md) &gt; [EventConfig](./base.eventconfig.md)

## EventConfig interface

Configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EventConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [context](./base.eventconfig.context.md) | unknown | A free-format field that will be added to all IEvent objects (to be used in custom logic added by the user). |
|  [message](./base.eventconfig.message.md) | string | The default <code>IEvent</code> message to use fo when none is provided |
|  [name](./base.eventconfig.name.md) | string | The default <code>IEvent</code> name to be used when none is provided |
|  [severity](./base.eventconfig.severity.md) | [Severity](./base.severity.md) | The severity of the <code>IEvent</code> - this value will be used to determine if we should considered the event occurrence a: - Success (event will be considered valid, no error handler action should be taken, and DO NOT report event) - Alert (event will be considered valid, and no error handler action should be taken, but report event) - Error (event will be considered invalid, error handler action will be taken, and report event) |
|  [source](./base.eventconfig.source.md) | string | The <code>IEvent</code> source string to be used when none is provided |
|  [type](./base.eventconfig.type.md) | [EventType](./base.eventtype.md) | The type of the <code>IEvent</code> (values can be defined by the user) |
